title: Well lit, spacious unit with fresh paint, AVL 7/26, 30TH-05
posting_body: ['Schedule a tour today: <URL>', '**Photos of SIMILAR apartment**', 'Top floor unit located in Highland Heights!', 'This unit features granite counters, newer cabinets, new carpet throughout, freshly painted, dual pane windows, updated bathroom, great lighting with open and spacious floor plan and large patio.', 'Highland Heights is located close by Lake Merritt, Park Avenue, public transportation, and easy access to hwy 580!', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: 1 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Parking: Carport', 'Lease Duration: 12 months', 'Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs', 'Laundry: Shared, Coin Operated', 'Floor: 2nd', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Private Patio', 'Range / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Cable-ready', 'Intercom system', 'Fireplace', 'BUILDING FEATURES', 'Controlled Access', 'On-Site Laundry', 'Gated Carport: $100/mo', 'Pets: $50-75/month depending on size', 'Contact info:', 'show contact info', "NOTE: The City of Oakland's Fair Chance Housing Ordinance requires that rental housing providers display this notice to applicants -", '<URL>', 'Notice.10.5.2020.pdf']
